poemsDataJson.list_full: めぐり逢(あ)ひて 見(み)しやそれとも わかぬ間(ま)に 雲隠(くもがく)れにし 夜半(よは)の月(つき)かな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Meeting on the path://But I cannot clearly know//If it was he,//Because the midnight moon//In a cloud had disappeared.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Meguri aite|Mishi ya sore to mo|Wakanu ma ni|Kumo-gakure ni shi|Yowa no tsuki kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: くもかくれにし よはのつきかな
poemsDataJson.author: 紫式部(むらさきしきぶ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: あわただしく帰っていった幼友だちへの名残惜しさ
